title: Chicken rolls in red chilli sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 onion', '1 clove garlic', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '250g mushrooms, sliced', '2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh coriander', '6 (150g) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, pounded 7.5mm thick', '225g thinly sliced ham', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '475ml water', '5 fresh red chillies, stemmed and seeded or to taste', '450g tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '125ml orange juice', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt to taste']
